column1: Beat eggs in a large bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy; beat in sugar gradually on high speed. Add cream and beat until batter has doubled in volume. Beat in butter until well combined. Beat in flour and salt on low speed until well combined. Beat in melted chocolate on medium speed until well combined. Stir in chocolate chips and pecans. Pour batter into muffin cups.

column1: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Remove from heat and stir in chocolate until melted. Allow to cool lightly.

column1: Fold lightly cooled chocolate mixture into the egg yolk mixture using a spatula.
column2: fold lightly cooled chocolate mixture into the egg yolk mixture using a spatula .

column1: Beat egg whites in a glass, metal, or ceramic bowl until foamy using the electric mixer on medium speed. Gradually add remaining sugar and salt, continuing to beat until stiff peaks form.
column2: beat egg whites in a glass , metal , or ceramic bowl until foamy using the electric mixer on medium speed . gradually add remaining sugar and salt , continuing to beat until stiff peaks form .

column1: Stir 1/3 of the egg whites into the chocolate batter to thin it out. Then carefully fold in the remaining egg whites using a spatula. Immediately transfer batter into the prepared springform pan.

column1: Cool on a wire rack until completely cool. Unmold carefully, since the torte breaks easily.
